example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_NOM كل) (NP (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS محا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاذهان))) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC صورة) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN محطة) (NP (NOUN_PROP بحمدون)))) (PUNC ,) (NP-ADV (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC شرارة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حرب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجبل)))))) (PUNC .)))
